gates
Class Gate

java.lang.Object
  gates.Gate
All Implemented Interfaces:
GateInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
DenseGate, FuncHad, Measurement, Randomiser
public abstract class Gate
extends java.lang.Object
implements GateInterface

A gate object is a member of a linked list of gates. Each gate has a field that points to the next gate in a linked list.

Author:
Ewan Hemmingway
Ian Sullivan
James Vokes
